long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Geany-plugins-geanylatex should not have a whole LaTeX distribution as a hard dependency.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): geany-plugins-geanylatex.x86_64 1.27-1.fc23
How reproducible:
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Append "install_weak_deps=False" to dnf.conf 2. Run "dnf install geany-plugins-geanylatex"
Actual results:
It wants to install a whole LaTeX distribution.
Expected results:
It should install only the Geany LaTeX plugin
Additional info:
Installing only the plugin without whole LaTeX would be useful if one wants to build the files on a remote host via ssh, just edit the files without building them or install LaTeX outside of the package manager.
